cast.name: 尼克·杰利拉伊 Nik Xhelilaj

writer.name: 杰尔吉·乔瓦尼 Gjergj Xhuvani

director.name: 杰尔吉·乔瓦尼 Gjergj Xhuvani

introduction: The story takes place in March 1999, Kosovo. it is the period of NATO bombing. Massive displacement of Albanians on ethnic basis. Terror, fear, insecurity, hunger has plagued Gjakova town located on the border with Albania. This does not exclude that along the narration the situations are built on a logic flow, moments of humor, eroticism, that occasionally avoid blackness of circumstances, which cross the theme of the film. The film initially develops in two parallel lines that then converge, connected to a common thread, where, at the end, each of the lines goes back to its own fate. It is a film for adults and children too.
